about.title: About
about.subtitle: A passionate Frontend React Developer, based in Russia, Vladivostok üßç
about.text: At the moment I am a beginner IT specialist. I have already formed goals that I want to achieve. And one of them is to become a professional Frontend developer. I understand that I am now at the beginning of my journey and I still have a lot to learn, but having a goal, I am ready to learn, develop and devote myself to my favorite business with great passion.
